00033 CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::CSwordLexiconModuleInfo( SWModule* module) : CSwordModuleInfo(module) {
00034     m_entryList = 0;
00035 }
00036 
00037 CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::CSwordLexiconModuleInfo( const CSwordLexiconModuleInfo& m ) : CSwordModuleInfo(m) {
00038     if (m_entryList)
00039         delete m_entryList;
00040     m_entryList = 0;    
00041         
00042     if (m.m_entryList) {
00043         m_entryList = new QStringList();
00044         *m_entryList = *m.m_entryList;//copy list items
00045     }
00046 }
00047 
00048 CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::~CSwordLexiconModuleInfo(){
00049 //  if (m_entryList)
00050         delete m_entryList;
00051 }
00052 
00054 QStringList* const CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::entries(){
00055     if (!m_entryList) {
00056         if (!module()) {
00057             return 0;
00058         }
00059         m_entryList = new QStringList();
00060 
00061     bool lexiconCache = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::lexiconCache);
00062         bool read = false;
00063 
00064         if (lexiconCache){
00065         QFile f1(
00066             QString::fromLatin1("%1/%2")
00067                 .arg(KGlobal::dirs()->saveLocation("data", "bibletime/cache/"))
00068                 .arg( name() )
00069         );
00070         
00071       if ( f1.open( IO_ReadOnly ) ){
00072         QDataStream s( &f1 );
00073             QString v;
00074         s >> v;
00075             if (v == config(ModuleVersion) ) {
00076                 s >> *m_entryList;
00077                 read = true;
00078             }
00079             f1.close();
00080       }
00081         }
00082 
00083 
00084         if (!read){
00085             (*module()) = TOP;          
00086         do {
00087             m_entryList->append(QString::fromUtf8(module()->KeyText()));
00088             (*module())++;
00089         } while (!module()->Error());
00090 
00091         if (m_entryList->first().stripWhiteSpace().isEmpty())
00092             m_entryList->remove( m_entryList->begin() );            
00093 
00094             if (lexiconCache){
00095             // create cache
00096                 QString dir = KGlobal::dirs()->saveLocation("data", "bibletime/cache/");
00097         QFile f2( QString::fromLatin1("%1/%2").arg(dir).arg( name() ) );
00098         if (f2.open( IO_WriteOnly )){
00099           QDataStream s( &f2 );
00100                 s << config(CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleVersion);
00101                 s << *m_entryList;
00102               f2.close();
00103         }
00104             }
00105             (*module()) = TOP;          
00106         }
00107     }   
00108     return m_entryList;
00109 }
00110 
00112 const bool CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::snap(){
00113     bool ret = false;
00114     if(module()->getRawEntry()){    //snap to the current entry
00115         ret = true;
00116     }
00117     return ret;
00118 }
00119 
00121 CSwordModuleInfo* CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::clone(){
00122     return new CSwordLexiconModuleInfo(*this);
00123 }
